title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-10.6 - Special trucks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-10.6 - Special trucks

State Regulations
(a) Every motor truck used for the transportation of ready mixed concrete or other
material, which requires the continuous operation of any engine attached to
such truck during loading and unloading, shall be equipped with exhaust piping
to discharge above the truck all exhaust gases created during loading or
unloading. (b) The owner, contractor, or his agent or any other person in charge of any job where such
trucks are used, shall provide such supplementary piping or other equipment as
may be necessary to divert the exhaust gases from the breathing zone of any
persons. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
23-10.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
